plugin.label: EC-ISPW
plugin.author: CloudBees
plugin.description: Integrates Compuware ISPW into CloudBees CD
plugin.detailedDescription: Compuware ISPW is a source code management, release automation, and deployment automation tool for mainframe DevOps. It enables developers to quickly and safely build, test and deploy mainframe code. This plugin allows CloudBees CD to interact with Compuware ISPW to control the lifecycle of Mainframe applications and extend DevOps practices to Mainframe releases and software updates.
